alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 11:21AM EST until December 23 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport, Elliston, Petersburg, and Hazleton. .Rainfall of 1 to 2 inches from Friday night into Saturday caused minor flooding to develop along portions of the White River and the East Fork White River in southern parts of central Indiana. Flooding may persist into Christmas Eve for portions of the White River. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Edwardsport. * WHEN...From this morning to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flooding closes Old Vincennes Road. High water crosses SR 358 on the Daviess County side just west of the levee. Flooding begins to affect higher bottomlands. Residential property of river cabins begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 AM EST Sunday /12:00 AM CST Sunday/ the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.6 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
